\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage{tikz-3dplot}  % 三维支持
\usetikzlibrary{calc}     % 坐标计算库

\begin{document}
% 设置视角（方位角度和仰角）
\tdplotsetmaincoords{70}{110} 

% 定义杆件粗细变量
\newcommand{\memberThick}{2pt}

\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=2,tdplot_main_coords]

% 绘制坐标轴
\draw[thick,->] (-5,0,0) -- (5,0,0) node[anchor=north east]{\Large $x$};
\draw[thick,->] (0,0,0) -- (0,6,0) node[anchor=north west]{\Large $y$};
\draw[thick,->] (0,0,0) -- (0,0,7) node[anchor=south]{\Large $z$};

% 绘制五个点（定义为坐标点）
\coordinate (A) at (0,4,0);
\coordinate (B) at (0,2,5);
\coordinate (C) at (-3,0,0);
\coordinate (D) at (3,0,0);
\coordinate (E) at (0,0,5);

\fill[black] (A) circle (1.5pt) node[above right] {\Large A};
\fill[black] (B) circle (1.5pt) node[above right] {\Large B};
\fill[black] (C) circle (1.5pt) node[above left] {\Large C};
\fill[black] (D) circle (1.5pt) node[above left] {\Large D};
\fill[black] (E) circle (1.5pt) node[above left] {\Large E};

% 绘制连接线
\draw[line width=\memberThick] (A) -- (B);    % AB
\draw[line width=\memberThick] (A) -- (C);    % AC
\draw[line width=\memberThick] (A) -- (D);    % AD
\draw[line width=\memberThick] (B) -- (C);    % BC
\draw[line width=\memberThick] (B) -- (D);    % BD
\draw[line width=\memberThick] (B) -- (E);    % BE

% 绘制支座
\draw[line width=1.5pt] (C) -- ($(C) + (0,-0.5,0)$);
\draw[line width=1.5pt] (D) -- ($(D) + (0,-0.5,0)$);
\draw[line width=1.5pt] (E) -- ($(E) + (0,-0.5,0)$);

% 绘制空心圆圈
\fill[white] ($(C) + (0,-0.5,0)$) circle (2pt);
\draw[thick] ($(C) + (0,-0.5,0)$) circle (2pt);
\fill[white] ($(D) + (0,-0.5,0)$) circle (2pt);
\draw[thick] ($(D) + (0,-0.5,0)$) circle (2pt);
\fill[white] ($(E) + (0,-0.5,0)$) circle (2pt);
\draw[thick] ($(E) + (0,-0.5,0)$) circle (2pt);

% 绘制负载
\draw[line width=3pt,->] (A) -- ($(A) + (0,0,-1)$) node[below] {\Large 6 kN};

% 绘制长度标注
\draw[thick, <->, shorten <=2pt,shorten >=2pt] (0,5,0) -- (0,5,5);
\draw[thick] (0,2,5) -- (0,6,5);
\node[fill=white] at (0,5,2.5) {\Large 5 m};

\draw[thick, <->, shorten <=2pt,shorten >=2pt] (4,0,0) -- (4,4,0);
\node[fill=white] at (4,2,0) {\Large 4 m};
\draw[thick] (5,4,0) -- (0,4,0);

\draw[thick, <->, shorten <=2pt,shorten >=2pt] (0,0,2) -- (3,0,2);
\node[fill=white] at (1.5,0,2) {\Large 3 m};
\draw[thick] (3,0,0) -- (3,0,2.5);

\draw[thick, <->, shorten <=2pt,shorten >=2pt] (0,0,-0.5) -- (-3,0,-0.5);
\node[fill=white] at (-1.5,0,-0.5) {\Large 3 m};
\draw[thick] (-3,0,0) -- (-3,0,-1);
\draw[thick] (0,0,0) -- (0,0,-1);

\draw[thick, <->, shorten <=2pt,shorten >=2pt] (0,0,5.5) -- (0,2,5.5);
\node[fill=white] at (0,1,5.5) {\Large 2 m};
\draw[thick] (0,2,5) -- (0,2,6);

\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
